Class PowerUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • PowerUp

  • public class PowerUp
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class handles all the power up attributes, if you get a power up this class will apply and remove the effect
    Author:
    elan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerUp()
      Constructor for PowerUp fetches current state values and stores it in the Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      randomly (weighted) selects a powerUp and activates it
      void addLife() 
      void bulletPulse() 
      static void clearPowerUps()
      Deactivates the power Ups
      void deActivate()
      removes the effects of the powerUp
      void heal() 
      void instaKill() 
      void machineGun() 
      void multiShot() 
      void rapidFire() 
      void render()
      Draws the power up details on the screen
      void shield() 
      void slowMo()
      Activates slow Motion Powerup
